snippet: The United Nations’ highest court confirmed on Friday that Germany has legal immunity from being sued in foreign courts by victims of Nazi atrocities.
abstract: International Court of Justice in The Hague confirms that Germany has legal immunity from being sued in foreign courts by victims of Nazi atrocities.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations’ highest court confirmed on Friday that Germany has legal immunity from being sued in foreign courts by victims of Nazi atrocities.

headline.main: U.N. Court Upholds German Immunity From Suits by Victims of Nazi Atrocities
headline.print_headline: U.N. Court Upholds German Immunity From Suits by Victims of Nazi Atrocities

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
